item.description: Come join theMOVE (getoutma.org) as we offer our help to Pete & Jen’s Backyard Birds in Concord — small-scale growers of pasture-raised chickens. We’ll be slaughtering the birds, and getting them ready for sale. We’ll work from 7a-12:30p, followed by a lunch and reflection on the work. Volunteers are encouraged to stay until 6p to complete the workday, but it’s not required. $15 trip fee ($12 for theMOVE members) includes lunch, snacks, and carpooled transportation (to be arranged from Alewife T Station). For more info, and to sign up, please visit getoutma.org/volunteer.
item.name: Chicken Processing Workday @ Pete + Jen's Backyard Birds
